overview: The anonymous man wrote down all the events he lived to keep the memories of his deceased friends alive. When he reaches the last 5 days of his memories, he realizes that he will complete his mission and decides to say goodbye to his life. While thinking about how to say goodbye to his life in this five-day period, he starts to clash with his own soul. On the one hand, he tries to hold on to life. While the memories he has accumulated are playing games with his mind; He decides to silence all the voices in his mind and face his past for the last time. The footprints of the past do not meet him as he expected. Now there is only one thing left to do; Saying goodbye to your life and leaving your memories where they belong...
title: The Last 5 Days of My Life
